AD.description: Directory service that Microsoft developed for Windows domain networks.

ASP.description: Microsoft's first server side script engine for dynamically generated web page.

BA.description: Person who translates business requirments into functional and technical requirements.

WSUS.description: a computer program developed by Microsoft Corporation that enables administrators to manage the distribution of updates and hot fixes.

XML.description: A markup language that defines a set of rules for encoding documents in a format which is both human readable and machine readable.
